item.title: A Question During Judo Testing and Some Thoughts
item.description: “When your parents first learned that you were practicing judo, what was their reaction? You know, since judo is a martial art and you may hurt yourself during practice. They might feel worried”. This is one of the questions on the judo belt test yesterday. Ryan said his parents might have little concerns but they are fine with him doing it. Taylor said her mom is very supportive, sometimes she even asks Taylor to do some throws on her.

item.title: Alpha Diversity
item.description: Alpha Diversity Observed Features Evenness Phylogenetic Diversity

item.title: 论拖延
item.description: 我觉得我的拖延症日益严重了，这倒不是因为年龄的变化，而是因为我所需要完成的事情变难了。 就像小学的时候，我最讨厌的暑假作业就是作文，我会早早地
